entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
